content: row stocking stitch edge row 18 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 9sts row 19 decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog - 7sts cast off all 7 left inner paw sts fig 17 new born puppy pattern page 41 new born puppy pattern page 42 foreleg paws - left paw short row to shape the foot pad side 1 return to the row ends and the end of the foreleg bend seam at the left short row 1 increase kfb k8 w+tk foreleg short row 2 p10 rs facing beginning at your right corner at the left foreleg cast-on short row 3 k9 w+tk edge with yarn cd pick up and knit 15 sts across the row ends and short row 4 p9 across the bottom of the foreleg bend seam to the corner of the left short row 5 k8 w+tk inside foreleg cast-off edge - see fig 18 pick up and knit from a to b short row 6 p8 short row 7 k7 w+tk short row 8 p7 row 4 knit across all 20 sts a b short row to shape the foot pad side 2 short row 1 increase pfb p8 w+tp short row 2 k10 short row 3 p9 w+tp short row 4 k9 foreleg bend short row 5 p8 w+tp seam short row 6 k8 short row 7 p7 w+tp short row 8 k7 fig 18 row 5 decrease p2tog twice purl to last 4 sts p2tog twice - 17sts *row 1 increase pfb purl to last st pfb - 17sts cast off all 17 paw sole sts** row 2 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 19sts row 3 purl new born puppy pattern page 43 new born puppy pattern page 44 right paw return to the row ends at the right foreleg rs facing beginning at your right corner at the right inside foreleg cast-off edge with yarn cd pick up and knit 15 sts across the row ends and across the bottom of the foreleg bend seam to the corner of the right foreleg cast-on edge left foreleg work as left foot from * to ** marker left inner foreleg join paw and foreleg seam marker ws together fold the cast-off edge and mattress stitch both halves together for the paw pad match the foreleg marker with the inner foreleg marker and continue to work mattress to join along the front of the foreleg to the fig 19 cast-on edge - see fig 19 fig 20 stuff the leg and paw through the top of the foreleg` remove inner foreleg marker finishing paw touches with yarn f work paw indents by sewing straight stitches over the ends of the paws and drawing the stitches tightly to create dips in a the ends of the paws - see fig 17 join under-foreleg seam b lift up the stuffed foreleg and mattress stitch to join the inside of the foreleg to the breast from foreleg marker to
